description: This file defines a mock class Store2NotificationMock used in unit testing, which implements the INotification interface for Store2. It includes mock methods for simulating notifications related to store value changes.
external_methods: testing::MockMethod<void, void, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType, const std::string&, const std::string&, const std::string&)>

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing the INotification interface for unit testing store notifications

methods.name: ~Store2NotificationMock
methods.description: Destructor for the mock notification class

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate value change notifications with scope, namespace, key, and value

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const std::string& ns, const std::string& key, const std::string& value), (override))
